page.title: 10WRIST WATCHES
page.content: The 1980s shows the decline of manual wind up watches and the growing popuality of the digital and quartz watches which can be bought for around Â£3.00 - Â£8.00 or obtained free with 5 gallons of oil.Our school survey shows that the most popular watches are"1.Timex made in Switzerland 2.Casio+Seiko made in Japan 3.Zeon made in taiwan. Adults prefer more conventional watches The most expensive worn by Adults is a{ROLEX. They range from, Â£200-Â£50,000.They are worth the money because they take 1 year to make & test.They are carved out of a single block of metal & are fitted with a cyclops lens which magnifies the date 2 & a \ times.The{ROLEX}that goes to the greatest depth is the{SEA-DWELLER it goes to{4,000ft (1,220m).
